long_description: The Patagonia Violeta daypack is made to fit women's torsos. It offers 1 main compartment, a padded laptop sleeve, an exterior stuff pocket and plenty of small pockets for stashing goods. Sleek, single-compartment daypack is designed to fit a woman slipping through the daily flux; torso length and air-flow mesh shoulder straps are women-specific. Main compartment holds lunch, papers, books and a sweater; it has stash pockets inside for caching items. Padded sleeve holds up to a 15 in. laptop and is raised off the bottom to protect laptop from impact; sleeve secures with a buckle closure. Internal organizer contains the small stuff, a lanyard secures your keys, and dual stretch-woven pockets carry water bottles. Slip a hydration reservoir (sold separately) into the computer sleeve and route the tube through a built-in port when you're off for a day hike. Zippered microfleece-lined top pocket holds your audio device or sunglasses; exterior stash pocket keeps other items handy. Made from a tough yet supple 420-denier nylon oxford plain weave with 840-denier ballistics nylon reinforcements; fabric has a Durable Water Repellent finish. Patagonia Violeta has quilting on the front panel and an embroidered text logo.
short_description: The Patagonia Violeta daypack is made to fit women's torsos. It offers 1 main compartment, a padded laptop sleeve, an exterior stuff pocket and plenty of small pockets for stashing goods.
